Title: Black Ark Corsairs
Legend: Cruel-hearted and avaricious, Black Ark Corsairs are the footsoldiers of the Scourge Privateers. Wielding a variety of lethal weapons, they thrive in the chaos of a swirling melee, where their superior swordsmanship can be put to deadly use.

PitchBattleProfile.Notes: Battleline if general is SCOURGE PRIVATEERS

Intro: Each model in a Black Ark Corsairs unit is armed with a 1 of the following weapon options: Vicious Blade and Repeater Handbow; or Paired Vicious Blades.

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: 1 model in this unit can be a Reaver. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that modelâ€™s melee weapons.

Rules.Name: Standard Bearer
Rules.Rule: STANDARD BEARER: 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Standard Bearer. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of this unit while it includes any Standard Bearers.

Rules.Name: Musician
Rules.Rule: MUSICIAN: 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Hornblower. Add 1 to run rolls and charge rolls for this unit while it includes any Hornblowers.

Rules.Name: Skilled Swashbucklers
Rules.Fluff: With a flash of steel, each ill-timed strike directed at a Corsair is paid for in blood as the aelf delivers a perfect riposte.
Rules.Rule: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a melee weapon that targets this unit is 1, the attacking unit suffers 1 mortal wound after all of its attacks have been resolved.
